sect1.title: TcpIp stack dependency
sect1.para:
DoIP Chorus contains some dependency to TcpIp stack due to IP addresses configured in TcpIp and also due to some chapters specified in the requiremets from the ISO 13400-2:2012 standard: :
Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_15953, SWR_ICAS1_GW_18994, SWR_ICAS1_GW_18995, SWR_ICAS1_GW_18993, SWR_ICAS1_GW_18989, SWR_ICAS1_GW_14598, SWR_ICAS1_GW_14577
Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_14567
Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_14559 SWR_ICAS1_GW_14569
Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_14555
Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_14557 SWR_ICAS1_GW_14547

sect1.title: Eth stack dependency
sect1.para:
MAC Frames Transmission / Reception over the VLAN_Gateway shall comply also with the requirements contained in the ISO 13400-2:2012 standard and the MAC frame length shall be limited to 1 500 bytes:
Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_15853

sect1.title: DCM stack dependency
sect1.para:
Another dependency is with DCM where is configured the transmission/reception buffers for specified protocols:
Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_GW_15952 SWR_ICAS1_GW_15951
